itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Gordon Hale Lewis (born 23 June 1936) is a Welsh former rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1950s, 1960s and 1970s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Swansea RFC, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Great Britain, Wales and Other Nationalities, and at club level for Leigh (Heritage № 680), and Swinton, as a centre, i.e. number 3 or 4.

response: * 23 June – Gordon Lewis, Welsh rugby union and professional rugby league footballer

link_mentions.page: List of Great Britain national rugby league team players

response: *Gordon Lewis (rugby) (born 1939), Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer
* Gordon Lewis won a cap for Wales while at Leigh in 1970 against England, and won a cap for Great Britain while at Leigh in 1965 against New Zealand
